channel.title: CVE Feed for Faronics -- DeepFreeze
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Faronics -- DeepFreeze

item.title: CVE-2024-8159|2024-10-03T15:22:50.199Z -- faronics -- deepfreeze
item.description: Deep Freeze 9.00.020.5760 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability by triggering the 0x70014 IOCTL code of the FarDisk.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-8159|2024-10-03T06:10:13.190Z -- faronics -- deepfreeze
item.description: Deep Freeze 9.00.020.5760 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability by triggering the 0x70014 IOCTL code of the FarDisk.sys driver.
